title: User Authentication and Profile Setup
description: As a new user (parent or child), I want to be able to sign up and log in securely so that I can access my personalized FamilyFlow account.
acceptance_criteria: User can sign up using email and password.
User can sign up using Google Sign-In.
Existing users can log in using their credentials or Google Sign-In.
Users can create and manage their profile including name, age, and avatar.
Parents can control permissions and access for child accounts.

title: Shared Family Calendar Management
description: As a parent, I want to manage a shared family calendar where I can add, edit, and view all family events, assign them to specific members, and categorize them with colors, so that I can have a clear overview of everyone's schedule.
acceptance_criteria: Users can add new events to the calendar.
Users can edit existing events.
Users can delete events.
Events can be assigned to specific family members.
Event types can be customized with unique names and color-coding.
The calendar displays daily, weekly, and monthly views.
All changes made by one parent are reflected in real-time for the other shared parent.

title: Recurring Schedule Creation and Management
description: As a parent, I want to easily set up recurring schedules for classes, activities, or study times (daily, weekly, monthly) with specified end dates, so that I don't have to manually add the same events repeatedly.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create events that repeat daily, weekly, or monthly.
Users can specify the end date for recurring events or set them to repeat indefinitely.
Users can edit individual instances or all future occurrences of a recurring event.
The system automatically populates recurring events on the calendar based on the set schedule.

title: Task Management for Kids
description: As a parent, I want to create and assign tasks (like homework or chores) to my children, and as a child, I want to easily see and mark my tasks as completed, so that responsibilities are clear and trackable.
acceptance_criteria: Parents can create tasks including descriptions.
Parents can assign tasks to specific children.
Children can view a list of their assigned tasks.
Children can mark tasks as completed.
Parents can see which tasks have been completed by their children.

title: Gamified Rewards System for Kids
description: As a parent, I want to set up a reward system where my children earn points for completing tasks and can redeem these points for predefined rewards, so that I can motivate them to fulfill their responsibilities.
acceptance_criteria: Parents can assign point values to tasks.
Parents can define redeemable rewards with associated point costs.
Children can view their current point balance.
Children can browse and select available rewards to redeem.
The system deducts points when a child redeems a reward.
Parents can optionally approve reward redemptions.
Children have a clear and engaging interface to interact with the rewards system.

title: Google Calendar Synchronization
description: As a parent, I want to seamlessly sync my FamilyFlow calendar with my Google Calendar, so that all my important events are in one place and accessible across devices.
acceptance_criteria: Users can log in to FamilyFlow using their Google account.
Users can choose to import events from their connected Google Calendar into FamilyFlow.
Users can choose to export events from FamilyFlow to their connected Google Calendar.
FamilyFlow events automatically sync to Google Calendar (and vice versa) in near real-time.

title: Add Notes and Details to Events
description: As a parent, I want to add specific notes, locations, or instructions to calendar events, so that all necessary information is readily available for any scheduled activity.
acceptance_criteria: Users can add a text field for notes when creating or editing an event.
Users can specify a location for an event.
The added notes and location are visible when viewing event details.
This information is synced across shared parent accounts.

title: Parental Dashboard Overview
description: As a parent, I want a dedicated dashboard that provides a quick overview of upcoming family events, pending tasks for my children, and their progress on completed tasks and earned points, so that I can stay informed at a glance.
acceptance_criteria: A dashboard screen is accessible to parents.
The dashboard displays a summary of the next few upcoming family events.
The dashboard shows a list of pending tasks for each child.
The dashboard provides a summary of children's completed tasks and accumulated points.

title: 21-Day Routine Builder
description: As a parent, I want to utilize a '21-Day Routine Builder' feature to help establish new habits or get back on track with schedules, so that I can guide my children through structured transitions.
acceptance_criteria: Users can access a '21-Day Routine Builder' feature.
The feature offers pre-defined templates or a guided setup process for routines.
The system visually tracks the child's progress through the 21-day routine.
Completed days within the routine are clearly marked.

title: Sharing Calendar with Co-Parent
description: As a parent, I want to share my FamilyFlow calendar and task management view with my partner, so that we can both stay updated and coordinate family responsibilities effectively.
acceptance_criteria: A parent can invite another parent/guardian to join their family account.
The invited parent can sign up/log in and accept the invitation.
Once connected, both parents have access to the shared family calendar and task lists.
Updates made by one parent are visible to the other in real-time.

title: Basic Reminder Notifications
description: As a user (parent or child), I want to receive timely notifications for upcoming events and assigned tasks, so that I don't miss important activities or deadlines.
acceptance_criteria: Users receive push notifications for events starting soon.
Users receive push notifications for newly assigned tasks.
Users receive push notifications for upcoming task deadlines.
Notification preferences can be managed (e.g., enable/disable).

title: Customizable Event and Task Categories
description: As a parent, I want the ability to create my own custom event types and task categories, beyond the defaults, so that the app can be tailored to my family's specific activities and needs.
acceptance_criteria: Parents can add new custom event categories with associated colors.
Parents can add new custom task categories.
These custom categories are available when creating new events or tasks.

title: In-App Messaging (Parent-to-Child)
description: As a parent, I want to send simple messages or encouragement directly to my child's profile within the app, so that I can communicate with them conveniently about their schedule or tasks.
acceptance_criteria: Parents can access a messaging interface linked to their child's profile.
Parents can type and send short messages.
Children can see messages sent by their parent on their profile.
The messaging system is simple and easy to use.

title: Advanced Reward Customization
description: As a parent, I want more advanced options for customizing rewards, such as setting specific conditions or approval workflows, so that I can have greater control over the reward system.
acceptance_criteria: Parents can set different point values for different types of tasks.
Parents can configure rewards that require manual approval after redemption.
Parents can set up rewards that are not tied to a point cost but are granted manually.

title: Advanced Family Analytics
description: As a parent using the premium subscription, I want access to detailed reports on family time allocation, task completion trends, and reward spending, so that I can gain deeper insights into our family's productivity and habits.
acceptance_criteria: A dedicated 'Analytics' section is available for premium users.
Reports show time spent on different categories (e.g., classes, homework, play).
Reports display task completion rates over selected periods.
Reports visualize reward redemption history and patterns.

title: Subscription Payment Gateway Integration
description: As an administrator, I want to integrate a secure payment gateway, so that users can subscribe to premium features via monthly payments.
acceptance_criteria: Integration with a selected payment gateway (e.g., Stripe, Braintree).
Users can select a monthly subscription plan.
Secure processing of payment details.
Subscription status is managed and reflected in user accounts.
Automated billing for recurring subscriptions.
